entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 11:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: E 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow or ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
